Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Twelve patients ( 43 % ) were found to have intraoperative ipsilateral vocal cord paralysis .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Chemical" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Chemical |
| --- |
| ipsilateral |

Explanation:

* "Ipsilateral" is a chemical term that refers to the side of the body or organ that is closest to or on the same side as something else. In this case, it refers to the side of the vocal cords that is affected by paralysis.
